radiographic_examinations.findings: Right atrial diameter of 6.2 cm, short-axis end-diastolic diameter of the right ventricle of 5.1 cm, right ventricle with eccentric hypertrophy and fractional area shortening of 33%.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Continued right-sided heart dilatation (atrial diameter = 6.3 cm, end-diastolic ventricular diameter = 5.4 cm) and decreased right ventricular fractional area shortening to 25% at 32 weeksâ€™ gestation.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Atrial diameter of 7.4 cm, end-diastolic ventricular diameter of 5.7 cm, low (20%) fractional area shortening of the right ventricle, and a newly patent foramen ovale with right-to-left shunt.
